# Armband of Reduction
## Overview
**Aura** faint transmutation; **CL** 5th

**Slot** â€”

**Price** 2,000 gp

**Weight** 1 lb.

**Description**

This metal armband allows its wearer to reduce his height to one-half normal, as if a *[[Reduce Person (Spell)|reduce person]]* spell had been cast upon him. This effect functions once per day, lasts for 2 hours, and may be dismissed at will by the wearer.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], [[Reduce Person (Spell)|reduce person]]

**Cost** 1,000 gp

**Source:** Arms and Equipment Guide (WotC), pg. 129
